src:
3 WN Tiongkok Hilang Saat Menyelam di Pulau Sangiang Banten
04 Nov 2019, 08:08 by M Iqbal
Serang - Tiga warga negara Tiongkok hilang saat menyelam di Pulau Sangiang, Serang, Banten. Ketiganya diduga terbawa arus saat hendak ke permukaan.
"Iya, 3 WNA itu, WN Tiongkok. Lagi selam kemarin, kan dibagi dua tim dari 6 orang, 3 muncul 3 lagi sempet muncul tapi kebawa arus," kata Kasubsi Ops Basarnas Banten, Heru Amir saat dikonfirmasi, Senin (4/11/2019).
Berdasarkan informasi, ketiga WNA itu berangkat dari Pantai Mabak di Merak bersama 4 orang temannya pada Minggu (3/11) pagi. Setelah sampai di Pulau Sangiang, mereka menyelam untuk menikmati keindahan bawah laut.
Mereka yang melakukan penyelaman berjumlah 6 orang dibagi dalam dua tim masing-masing 3 orang. Tim pertama berhasil muncul ke permukaan. Namun, tim kedua hilang terbawa arus meski sempat muncul juga ke permukaan.
text:
3 Chinese citizens missing when diving on Sangiang island, Banten
Nov 04 2019, 08:08 by M Iqbal
Serang - Three Chinese citizens were lost while diving on Sangiang Island, Serang, Banten. All three were thought to be carried by the current when they wanted to surface.
"Yes, the 3 foreigners, Chinese WN. Again, yesterday's dive, was divided into two teams of 6 people, 3 appeared 3 more appeared but carried the current," said Kasubsi Ops Basarnas Banten, Heru Amir when confirmed, Monday (4/11 / 2019).
Based on information, the three foreigners departed from Mabak Beach in Merak with 4 friends on Sunday (3/11) morning. After arriving at Sangiang Island, they dive to enjoy the underwater beauty.
Those who do dives are 6 people divided into two teams of 3 people each. The first team successfully surfaced. However, the second team was lost with the current even though it had also surfaced.
